definition: (like) a cat on a hot tin roof/anxious/agitated
pinyin: re4 guo1 shang5 de5 ma3 yi3

definition: "ants climbing a tree", a Sichuan dish made with cellophane noodles 粉絲|粉丝[fen3 si1] and ground meat (so called because the particles of meat clinging to the noodles look like ants on the twigs of a tree)/(sex position) man standing, woman clinging to his upper body/(erotic massage) full-body licking
Ant Financial Services Group, an affiliate company of Alibaba 阿里巴巴[A1 li3 ba1 ba1]

sentences.english: Sprinkling coffee grounds around your garden eliminates cutworms and ants.
sentences.chinese: 將咖啡渣撒在你的花園裏可以消滅夜蛾和螞蟻。

sentences.english: Failing to find her homework, Jill is just like a cat on a hot tin roof.
sentences.chinese: 吉爾的作業找不到了，急得像熱鍋上的螞蟻。

sentences.english: The ants milk their herds by stroking them with their antennae.
sentences.chinese: 螞蟻用他們的觸角給他們的牧羣“擠奶”。

sentences.english: I come from a remaining Shan branch, ant team, young tiger young tiger set.
sentences.chinese: 我來自餘珊分公司，螞蟻團隊，彪彪組。

sentences.english: She pulled the brick and there was an ant. ( up )
sentences.chinese: 她撬起磚頭一看，發現下面有一隻螞蟻。

sentences.english: They were visited by a large colony of ants which obtaind a sort of honey from them.
sentences.chinese: 一大羣螞蟻就來找它們，從它們那裏可以得到某種蜜。

sentences.english: You can read about anchors. And all about ants.
sentences.chinese: 你可以讀到船錨，還有關於螞蟻的一切。

sentences.english: Like humans, ants can try to outwit foes with cheats and lies.
sentences.chinese: 如人類一樣，螞蟻同樣會用假象和欺騙來智取敵人。

sentences.english: When winter came, the grasshopper had nothing, but the ant complained of chest pains.
sentences.chinese: 到了冬天，蚱蜢一無所有，可是螞蟻卻喊胸口疼。

sentences.english: I fell back in the ant pile.
Ants climb the wall, before the big rain.
sentences.chinese: 螞蟻成羣爬上牆，雨水淋溼大屋樑。

sentences.english: A dynamic alignment hybrid ant-clustering and k-medoids(DAACM) algorithm is designed and realized.
sentences.chinese: 設計和實現了一種改進的螞蟻聚類算法。

sentences.english: A few small factories, using small and simple machines have been able to turn out parts for large machinery.
sentences.chinese: 幾個小廠用螞蟻啃骨頭的辦法造出了大型機件。

sentences.english: Asian ants build up piles of grasshopper debt and feel rich.
sentences.chinese: 亞洲螞蟻積累了大量的蚱蜢窩債權，感覺很富有。

sentences.english: She made good friends with the ant.
If you're an anteater, you capture termites with your long tongue.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是一隻食蟻獸，你會用長長的舌頭抓住螞蟻。

definition: one head/a head full of sth/one end (of a stick)/one side/headlong/directly/rapidly/simultaneously
cat/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/(dialect) to hide oneself/(coll.) modem
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
